name: Sword of Sheris (A Lenda do Kibo Beta)
name_original: Sword of Sheris (A Lenda do Kibo Beta)
description:
*Warning*

This game has been under development since 2020 due to technical issues, so development is paused at the moment.

Lore

in the year 4000, there are the power crystals, until it was stolen by the underworld owner Stickers, now Kibo has to rescue the crystals before he takes the power of the world.
